metadata.title: CVE-2022-2478 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in PDF in Google Chrome prior to 103.0.5060.134 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
